document_data.name: Malkyn Grenefeld
document_data.mainbody: '''Malkyn Grenefeld''' was a chamberlain of [[Hillsfar]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Hillsfar Reclaimed|9}}
document_data.Activities: Malkyn was the city's chamberlain and the court's mage.
document_data.Personality: Malkyn was totally loyal to [[Torin Nomerthal]]. She was very rigid and adhered to protocol. Malkyn was a talented mage.
